page.title: 04Social Concerns
page.content: Whilst{unemployment}is causing much concern, particularly as it effects school-leavers, to some it is not seen as long-term a problem as other issues. The{quality of family life}in general, and broken marriages and single-parent families in particular, seems to worry many people. There appears to be a predominance of 'young marriages', many of which lead to early separation. This very often has a disturbing effect on the children, and causes many problems. Among the generation of{retired {people}there seems to be a lot of loneliness and isolation: the community does not appear to be as closely knit as before, possibly because of a{loss of influence}on the community{of the Church.}
